The difference between an emulator iso and a wii iso is the size in the hard disk after extraction , while in emulator iso you only occupy the real siz eof the game , with the wii iso you need 4.37 gb even if the game have only 1gb and something , in a wii iso if you download a game with 1.5 gb for example after extraction , the game will be occupying 4.37 gb hard disk space beside the fact that was only 1.5 gb to download , so the emulator isos get nice sizes and only occupy the game real space , not the complete iso space that wii iso need to be ok .

If u have trouble running this game read following passage ...
1.If u got a message to connect 1 player's wiimote(if u have no real wiimote),& unable to play this game just open dolphin then click wiimote.Then select emulated wiimote.Then click configure,Now right side of window (Under shake option) u will see Extension.Under extetion select nunchuck then click configure.Now select ur key.Remape stick option for moving,remape button option for some power,Remap shake option for (Default is click 2) for shake move.Now u ready to go.
2.U can save [by pressing shift + f1,shift + f2....]& load [by pressing f1,f2,f3....] this game any time by the emulator.But sometime it will cause crash or some other bug & glitch.Alternatively the game will atomically save after some check point(when u get a star) so u have to play this game long enough to reach save point.So have patient.

I am now play this game in full screen with Resolution 1440x900 & 60fps with my keyboard & mouse.
